title: No full BE refund
body:
Dear Riot Games,

I recently haven’t played a lot if league, but i heard that there was going to be a huge update in pre season and that your current BE( before pre season) gets multiplied, your runes and rune pages will get refunded. The blue essence refundal was great, however there went somethinng wrong with the runes and rune pages. Somewhere in season 6 i bought a rune page with rp and alot of runes, however i didnt got them refunded. I had 1600 BE before pre season that times 6,5 is 10.500 BE, the problem is now that i didn’t recieve any BE for my precious runes and rune pages, and there aren’t quests where i can recieve these things.

Friendly regards,

DarkHav0c

replies.body: Rune pages themselves weren't given a currency refund since you can still use all of the pages you bought in the new rune system. If you bought 2 pages for example, you'll still be able to create 2 new pages. You *did* however get some special skins based on how many pages you had bought. Double check your purchase history for those skins since they should be showing up there. If you still don't see them I should be able to check for ya.
I checked at purchase history, (the place where you can refund etc.) but i didn’t find any skins i didn’t buy myself or unlocked with orange essence.

> [{quoted}](name=DarkHav0c,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=VBfshVsz,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-11-13T20:19:41.662+0000)
>
> I checked at purchase history, (the place where you can refund etc.) but i didn’t find any skins i didn’t buy myself or unlocked with orange essence.

And i don’t have the same amount of rune pages i could create last season, i had 1 ap page 1ad page and 1 tank page, i don’t know if the prebuild rune pages make up for that or not though.

The prebuilt pages don't count towards your limit I'm pretty sure. I double checked to see when you bought those rune pages, because if they were bought after Sept 1st that would explain why they weren't refunded as a skin. I'm not actually seeing where you bought *any* rune pages, but it's obvious you have since you are able to create new pages. I'd suggest reaching out to the EU billing team in a ticket to have them see what's going on.
How can i reach out for them?
You can check his profile on Lolking. They're still listing all the old rune/mastery pages.

Have you played a game first? From what I can remember I don't think my missions showed this either until after a game. After the game you should get blue essence orbs in your loot, open 'em.
If you already have played a game, I have no idea.
I did play multiple games and still nothing showed up or recieved something
